name: Google Search Material Design
description: CSS file to use with stylish making Google Search not look like garbage. Example Video https://youtu.be/iYi-gXggAv4 Including: Open animation Flatter design overall Removed unused buttons and menus Fixed position for cards Probably some more Using animate.css If you like this style please consider a donation to help me pay my studies and support future development
additional_info: Github gist here https://gist.github.com/rosenpin/9e74549e3fb04c96223e If you like this style please consider a donation to help me pay my studies and support future development
